name: Camel (TanaraKuranov)
description:
Deal with hunger, thirst, cannibal pygmies, and kidnapping Berbers in your trek across the Gobi Desert.

A modern port of Cary Torkelson's Camel, made as a small project to learn some GameMaker Studio 2. Has different distance checkpoints and a stats screen to help differentiate it from the original at least a little bit.
